meaningMnemonic: The <radical>tsunami</radical> of <radical>conflict</radical> will <kanji>cleanse</kanji> and <kanji>purify</kanji> the lands of people, homes, and culture.
readingMnemonic: Who could possibly stop this <kanji>cleanse</kanji> of all lands?! The only person capable of this is, of course, <reading>Joe</reading> (じょう), the local farmhand. He’s so tall and burly that he can stop even the largest of tsunamis… right?
